title: Инсинуации
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DkHuvZ

by Ginger_Squirrel

«Посмотрите на соседа слева, посмотрите на соседа справа. Знайте, двое из вас не доучатся до конца». Эту мантру Рей Тидо повторяла себе все пять лет обучения в Массачусетском Технологическом, выгрызая в гранитной скале тоннель в свое светлое будущее. И что могло пойти не так? Да все! Пережить последний год? Ха, миссия кажется невыполнимой.

Words: 4539, Chapters: 1/27, Language: Русский

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Armitage Hux, Phasma (Star Wars), Finn (Star Wars), Unkar Plutt, Luke Skywalker, Poe Dameron, Snoke (Star Wars), Original Male Character(s)
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Reylo - Freeform, Alternate Universe, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, University, Angst, Drama, Romance, Alternate Universe - Modern Setting


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DkHuvZ

title: Failover
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WQKPfh

by 13th_blackbird, anthean

failover: In computer analysis of large datasets, the automatic switching to another computer or node should one fail.

–

In 13 BBY, Eli Vanto turns down an offer from Myomar Academy and joins his family’s shipping business instead. Two years later he picks up a distress beacon from a nameless planet, where he meets a creature out of legend.

Meanwhile, Thrawn confronts the flaws in his flawless plan–and faces their consequences.

Words: 3026, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars: Thrawn Series - Timothy Zahn (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Thrawn | Mitth'raw'nuruodo, Eli Vanto, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Thrawn | Mitth'raw'nuruodo/Eli Vanto
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, trader!Eli AU, What-If, Hurt/Comfort, Chiss courtship rituals, Lysatran mythology, best laid plans going astray af, our love letter to Eli Vanto, Thrawn’s no-good very bad day, Slow Burn, eventual E rating, bunk beds, Talking, More talking, significant hair-touching, Forced Proximity, Accidental Courtship, count the blushes


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WQKPfh

blog.name: geekynerfherder
blog.title: Geeky Nerfherder
blog.description: UK based. Connoisseur of pop culture. Enthusiast of good things. Lover of Sci-fi & Fantasy. Devotee of contemporary, fantastical, comic & vintage art. Posting all that and more that grabs my interest.

summary: 'The Star Wars Trilogy' by Matt Saunders, a new officially licensed print release from Bottleneck Gallery, in collaboration with...
caption:
‘The Star Wars Trilogy’ by Matt Saunders, a new officially licensed print release from Bottleneck Gallery, in collaboration with Acme Archives.

18" x 24" screen prints in numbered limited editions of 150 for $40 each or $110 for the set of 3 prints.

On sale Friday February 8 at 12pm ET from the Bottleneck Gallery website.

summary: Failover - Chapter 1 - 13th_blackbird, anthean - Star Wars: Thrawn Series - Timothy Zahn (2017) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Failover - Chapter 1 - 13th_blackbird, anthean - Star Wars: Thrawn Series - Timothy Zahn (2017) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
@anthean and are very excited to introduce all of you to our fic, which we’ve been working on and squeeing about for over half a year IN SECRET. Look for our updates on Friday mornings for the next few weeks. 

failover: In computer analysis of large datasets, the automatic switching to another computer or node should one fail.

–

In 13 BBY, Eli Vanto turns down an offer from Myomar Academy and joins his family’s shipping business instead. Two years later he picks up a distress beacon from a nameless planet, where he meets a creature out of legend.

Meanwhile, Thrawn confronts the flaws in his flawless plan–and faces their consequences.

Tags include: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, trader!Eli AU, What-If, Hurt/Comfort, Chiss courtship rituals, Lysatran mythology, best laid plans going astray af, our love letter to Eli Vanto, Thrawn’s no-good very bad day, Slow Burn, eventual E rating, bunk beds, Talking, More talking, significant hair-touching, Forced Proximity, Accidental Courtship, count the blushes


We had a ton of fun making this for you and we hope you love it as much as we do!

summary: This Was The Best Star Wars Title Reveal Ever
title: This Was The Best Star Wars Title Reveal Ever
excerpt: No matter how, when or where we find out the title for Star Wars Episode IX, there’s little doubt it can touch what Lucasfilm did for Revenge of the Sith. And that includes Ewan’s red carpet realization.
description:
THAT VIDEO WITH ALL STAR WARS TITLES!

Now I feel is more lilely they reveling the title in the celebration. Imagine the hype?

summary: Raxus Prime was a once-beautiful Outer Rim world that eventually became polluted to the point that the entire planet was covered...
body:
Raxus Prime was a once-beautiful Outer Rim world that eventually became polluted to the point that the entire planet was covered in trash. The Separatist movement was born in the wreckage.

Source: Beyond the Rim (2013)

First Appearance: Boba Fett - The Fight to Survive (2002)

reblog.comment:
